org.zodiark.service

Interface Service

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionService, BroadcasterService, DBService, MonitoringService, PublisherService, StreamingSessionService, SubscriberService, WowzaService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionServiceImpl, BroadcastServiceImpl, ConfigService, DBServiceAdapter, DisconnectedEndpointService, ErrorHandlerService, InitService, MonitoringServiceImpl, PublisherServiceImpl, StreamingSessionServiceImpl, SubscriberServiceImpl, ValidateService, WordService, WowzaServiceImpl

    public interface Service
    A Service is a target of an EventBus. A Service can react to I/O events and messages dispatched via the EventBus. A Service implementation must be annotated with the On annotated in order to be discovered at runtime and made available to an EventBus.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reactTo(Envelope e, org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResource r, Reply reply)
      React to I/O events produced by a remote Endpoint and received via an AtmosphereResource connection.
      void reactTo(String path, Object message, Reply reply)
      React to message produced by other Service
